ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Error 1001
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems people have been having trouble everywhere.  My guild Hosted a Kael raid last night & we had to call it when the LD monster kept rearing it s ugly
ygData.messageBody:
It seems people have been having trouble everywhere.  My guild Hosted a Kael raid last night & we had to call it when the LD monster kept rearing it's ugly head.  it seems from what others were saying is people were dropping like flies all over the server last night.  (going LD).  hopefully this problem will resolve itself =/.

Katashaka Naboombu
51 Vah Shir Mystic
Co-Leader of Claws of Night
Vazaelle

 

 mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:

The techs asked for several files to assess my situation. Haven't
gotten anything conclusive back as yet.

The text of error 1001 is essentially saying that I cannot connect to
the login server. It is not the active character one.

The problem last year resolved after a patch.

Going to give the techs a few more days. Don't want to mess with too
much then have a lot to correct.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@y...> wrote:
> Barto ,
>
> What is the error 1001? is that the active char one?
> You can obviously hit the internet since you posted
> here.
>
> I am not aware of any connection issues.  What was the
> problem last year when it happened?
>
> IF all else fails, maybe reinstall EQ, maybe you have
> a corrupt file.  Have you messed with the EQ skins at
> all?
> Or maybe even the eqclient.ini file.  If so, rename
> the ini file and it will create a new one.
>
> If you get this write back or look for me on Yahoo
> chat as rlebeau65.  Not sure but maybe I can help.
>
> Talk about not being productive on a day off....lol
>
> ROb
>
>
> --- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@c...> wrote:
> > Still can't get on today. Third day without EQ fix.
> > Getting bad.
> > Thinking Earth and Beyond looks promising. Wrote the
> > techs for
> > support.
> >
> > Had this happen last year. Three days in a row. All
> > my days off.
> > Sucked big time. The error corrected itself,
> > somehow. I just don't
> > want to wait. Missing game time.
> >
> > AAArrghh!
> >
> > Barto
> >
> >
> Br
